availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: R.L. Threldkeld (Livingston County farmer and slaveholder)

body.p: Residence: Carrsville post office, Livingston County, KY. A Virginia-born wealthy farmer. Held nine slaves, according to 1860 slave census schedules.

R S Threldkeld 50
Sarah Threldkeld 45
Willis Threldkeld 23
James Threldkeld 18
William Threldkeld 16
Nora Threldkeld 14
Araminta Threldkeld 12
Robert Threldkeld 7
Elizabeth Woolfolk 75

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Division 2, Carrsville post office, p. 43.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Division 2, p. 5.
